p: Folin-Ciocalteu reagent, DPPH, DTNB, DNS, TPTZ, gallic acid, quercetin, pancreatic α-amylase (3.2.1.1), and AChE from Electrophorus electricus‎ (3.1.1.7) were purchased from Sigma Aldrich (St. Louis, MO, USA). FeCl 3, AlCl 3.6H 2O, K 3Fe(CN) 6, and ammonium iron (II) sulfate hexahydrate, (NH 4) 2Fe(SO 4) 2.6H 2O, were obtained from Merck (Darmstadt, Germany). All other chemicals and solvents (such as methanol, acetone, and ethanol) were of analytical grade purity. The specific buffers were freshly prepared in our biochemistry laboratory.
